overview: Almost a decade ago, Tracks Magazine took Mick Fanning, Joel Parkinson & Dean Morrison on their first ever Indo boat trip together. The three good friends were all still juniors. Today, things have changed slightly with the global surf stardom & the Cooly trio criss-crossing the planet for years, each traveling their own distinct path. Another two week Indo boat trip with friends and waves was needed. No contest, no pressure, no nothing, just all time memories. A unique surf film from the 3 degrees crew. The surfers and the producers finally back together again, exclusively shot on HD, a real insight into the Cooly kids. Its 3 Degrees meets September Sessions.
title: Fitty Fitty
